verbs.description: [ARG0: health department] [V: announces] [ARG1: initiative to reduce added sugar and salt in food] the health department announced friday an initiative to reduce sugar in packaged foods and lowering salt in food supply the national salt and sugar reduction initiative nssri is a partnership of nearly 100 local city and state health departments associations and organizations ac initiative food health department sugar
